message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to own this fantastic product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $950,000. I believe this reflects its worth while acknowledging your potential gain.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I think we can reach an agreement closer to my valuation. I would like to propose a price of $750,000.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective, $750,000 is significantly below its true value.  To move things forward, I can come down to $900,000.  This still represents a substantial gain for you.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my assessment, I would like to propose a price of $850,000.
